To: legal-response@theplanet.com; legalresponse2@theplanet.com;
abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: DMCA Complaint from BigLion.com
Importance: High


Dear Legal Response Team;
 
It has come to my attention that  <http://www.netshome.com>
http://www.netshome.com is active again on your server and is still a direct
copy of my website. You have already been informed of this fact and had
disabled the site in February as the email copied below shows. I am
informing you that the infringing site is now live again on your servers. I
urge you to IMMEDIATELY and PERMANENTLY remove this site from your server.
They are still violating my copyright and need to be permanently shut down.
 
Please respond and inform me of your immediate actions.
 
Sincerely,
Erik Vogel
